# --- Test Case 28 ---
Input:
8 8 8
0
3 1 6 5 3 6 9
0
2 1 6 3 7
0
2 4 2 2 9
1 2 8
1 1 6
2 1 5 6 4

2 4 6 2 1
1 2 7
0
1 0 2
1 6 7
3 5 5 1 6 2 2

0
4 0 36 4 6 5 18 6 63
0
4 0 30 2 49 4 6 5 18

2 2 8 4 48
